text: Suiran youtai jiaotu he jidu jiaotu dou shi nian tongyi bu jingdian de ren, dan youtai jiaotu queshuo:“Jidu jiaotu xinfeng de hao wu jiazhi.” Jidu jiaotu ye shuo:“Youtai jiaotu xinfeng de hao wu jiazhi.” Naxie wu zhi zhe [bai ouxiang zhe] ye shuo leisi tamen suo shuo dehua. Fuhuo ri, an la jiang wei tamen panjue tamen suo fenqi de.
